comments.en:
Plug and Print. Flawless.
1200x600 mode requires a different driver. I can't tell the difference when using 600x600.
Supports Parallel, USB, and Ethernet out of the box.
Comes with 4MB of RAM upgradable to 36MB with a single 72-pin SIMM.
Emulates PCL6 and Level 2 Postscript.

Brother publishes proprietary Linux drivers for CUPS and LPD for most of their laser printers and multi-function devices, including SANE drivers for the scanners. They can be downloaded free of charge on their Linux driver page.

Consumables/Refills: Toner TN430 (3k pages) or TN460 (6k pages) DR400 Drum Unit
